trans-unit.source: Controls how a document is printed from a Windows Forms application.
trans-unit.target: Controlla la modalità di stampa un documento da un'applicazione Windows Form.

trans-unit.source: This class implements a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController> and adds a status dialog box.
trans-unit.target: Questa classe implementa un <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController>e aggiunge una finestra di dialogo di stato.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController>

trans-unit.source: A print controller specifies how a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> is printed.
trans-unit.target: Specifica un controller di stampa come un <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>viene stampato.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>

trans-unit.source: For a list of initial property values for an instance of the PrintControllerWithStatusDialog class, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Per un elenco di valori di proprietà iniziali per un'istanza della classe PrintControllerWithStatusDialog, vedere il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.%23ctor%2A>costruttore.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about printing with Windows Forms, see the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing> namespace overview.
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sulla stampa con Windows Form, vedere il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing>Panoramica dello spazio dei nomi.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing>

trans-unit.source: If you want to print from a Windows Presentation Foundation application, see the <xref:System.Printing> namespace.
trans-unit.target: Se si desidera stampare da un'applicazione Windows Presentation Foundation, vedere il <xref:System.Printing>dello spazio dei nomi.</xref:System.Printing>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog"></xref> class, wrapping the supplied <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog"> </xref> (classe), includendo l'oggetto fornito <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController"></xref> to encapsulate.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController"> </xref> per incapsulare.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog"></xref> class, wrapping the supplied <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController"></xref> and specifying a title for the dialog box.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog"> </xref> (classe), includendo l'oggetto fornito <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController"> </xref> e specificare un titolo per la finestra di dialogo.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController"></xref> to encapsulate.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController"> </xref> per incapsulare.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> containing a title for the status dialog box.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.String>contenente un titolo per la finestra di dialogo di stato.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating this <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog"></xref> is used for print preview.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica ciò <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog"> </xref> viene utilizzato per l'anteprima di stampa.

trans-unit.source: The IsPreview checks the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.IsPreview%2A> property of the underlying controller.
trans-unit.target: I controlli IsPreview il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.IsPreview%2A>proprietà del controller sottostante.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.IsPreview%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog"></xref> is used for print preview, otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog"> </xref> viene utilizzato per l'anteprima di stampa, in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Completes the control sequence that determines when and how to print a page of a document.
trans-unit.target: Completa la sequenza di controllo che determina quando e come stampare una pagina di un documento.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog> class calls the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPage%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method on the encapsulated <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController>.
trans-unit.target: La <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog>classe chiama il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPage%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metodo incapsulato <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController>.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPage%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog>

trans-unit.source: The OnEndPage method is called immediately after the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> raises the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> event.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo OnEndPage viene chiamato immediatamente dopo il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>Genera il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage>evento.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>

trans-unit.source: If an exception is thrown inside a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> event of a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>, OnEndPage is not called.
trans-unit.target: Se viene generata un'eccezione all'interno di un <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage>evento di un <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>, non viene chiamato OnEndPage.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnStartPrint%2A> method creates the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object that is sent to the printer.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnStartPrint%2A>metodo crea il <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>oggetto che viene inviato alla stampante.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnStartPrint%2A>

trans-unit.source: After <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnStartPrint%2A> is called, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnStartPage%2A> method sets the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object to a graphic of a single page.
trans-unit.target: Dopo aver <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnStartPrint%2A>viene chiamato, il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnStartPage%2A>metodo imposta la <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>oggetto su un'immagine di una singola pagina.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnStartPage%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnStartPrint%2A>

trans-unit.source: (Use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnStartPage%2A> to set how to print a page in a document.
trans-unit.target: (Utilizzare <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnStartPage%2A>per impostare la modalità stampare una pagina in un documento.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnStartPage%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, you can adjust page settings separately for each page.) OnEndPage clears the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object, while the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnEndPrint%2A> method deallocates the object.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, è possibile modificare le impostazioni di pagina separatamente per ogni pagina.) Cancella OnEndPage di <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>oggetto, mentre il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnEndPrint%2A>metodo la deallocazione.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnEndPrint%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"></xref> that represents the document currently being printed.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"> </xref> che rappresenta il documento in fase di stampa.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs"> </xref> che contiene i dati dell'evento.

trans-unit.source: Completes the control sequence that determines when and how to print a document.
trans-unit.target: Completa la sequenza di controllo che determina quando e come stampare un documento.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog> class calls the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPrint%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method on the encapsulated <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController>.
trans-unit.target: La <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog>classe chiama il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPrint%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metodo incapsulato <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController>.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnEndPrint%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog>

trans-unit.source: The OnEndPrint method is called immediately after the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> raises the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.EndPrint> event.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo OnEndPrint viene chiamato immediatamente dopo il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>Genera il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.EndPrint>evento.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.EndPrint> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnStartPrint%2A> method creates the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object that is sent to the printer.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnStartPrint%2A>metodo crea il <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>oggetto che viene inviato alla stampante.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnStartPrint%2A>

trans-unit.source: After <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnStartPrint%2A> is called, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnStartPage%2A> method sets the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object to a graphic of a single page.
trans-unit.target: Dopo aver <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnStartPrint%2A>viene chiamato, il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnStartPage%2A>metodo imposta la <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>oggetto su un'immagine di una singola pagina.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnStartPage%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnStartPrint%2A>

trans-unit.source: (Use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnStartPrint%2A> to determine when and how to print a document.
trans-unit.target: (Utilizzare <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnStartPrint%2A>per determinare quando e come stampare un documento.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnStartPrint%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, you can delay printing for 30 minutes or adjust the printer settings for the document.) The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnEndPage%2A> method clears the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object, while OnEndPrint deallocates the object.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, è possibile ritardare la stampa di 30 minuti o modificare le impostazioni della stampante per il documento.) Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnEndPage%2A>metodo cancella il <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>dell'oggetto, mentre OnEndPrint la deallocazione.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnEndPage%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"></xref> that represents the document currently being printed.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"> </xref> che rappresenta il documento in fase di stampa.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs"> </xref> che contiene i dati dell'evento.

trans-unit.source: Begins the control sequence that determines when and how to print a page of a document.
trans-unit.target: Avvia la sequenza di controllo che determina quando e come stampare una pagina di un documento.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog> class calls the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPage%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method on the encapsulated <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController>.
trans-unit.target: La <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog>classe chiama il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPage%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metodo incapsulato <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController>.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPage%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog>

trans-unit.source: The OnStartPage method is called immediately before the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> raises the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> event.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo OnStartPage viene chiamato immediatamente prima di <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>Genera il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage>evento.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.PrintPage> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnStartPrint%2A> method creates the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object that is sent to the printer.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnStartPrint%2A>metodo crea il <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>oggetto che viene inviato alla stampante.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnStartPrint%2A>

trans-unit.source: After <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnStartPrint%2A> is called, OnStartPage sets the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object to a graphic of a single page.
trans-unit.target: Dopo aver <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnStartPrint%2A>viene chiamato, il set di OnStartPage di <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>oggetto su un'immagine di una singola pagina.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnStartPrint%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnEndPage%2A> method clears the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object, while the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnEndPrint%2A> method deallocates the object.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnEndPage%2A>metodo cancella il <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>oggetto, mentre il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnEndPrint%2A>metodo la deallocazione.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnEndPrint%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnEndPage%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use OnStartPage to set how to print a page in a document.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare OnStartPage per impostare la modalità stampare una pagina in un documento.

trans-unit.source: For example, you can adjust page settings separately for each page.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, è possibile regolare le impostazioni di pagina separatamente per ogni pagina.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"></xref> that represents the document currently being printed.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"> </xref> che rappresenta il documento in fase di stampa.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintPageEventArgs"> </xref> che contiene i dati dell'evento.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> object that represents a page from a <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> oggetto che rappresenta una pagina da un <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Begins the control sequence that determines when and how to print a document.
trans-unit.target: Avvia la sequenza di controllo che determina quando e come stampare un documento.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog> class calls the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method on the encapsulated <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController>.
trans-unit.target: La <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog>classe chiama il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metodo incapsulato <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController>.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController.OnStartPrint%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog>

trans-unit.source: The OnStartPrint method is called immediately after the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> raises the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.BeginPrint> event.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo OnStartPrint viene chiamato immediatamente dopo il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>Genera il <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.BeginPrint>evento.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument.BeginPrint> </xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>

trans-unit.source: Use OnStartPrint to determine when and how to print a document.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare OnStartPrint per determinare quando e come stampare un documento.

trans-unit.source: For example, you can delay printing for 30 minutes or adjust the printer settings for the document.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, è possibile ritardare la stampa di 30 minuti o modificare le impostazioni della stampante per il documento.

trans-unit.source: OnStartPrint creates the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object that is sent to the printer.
trans-unit.target: Crea OnStartPrint il <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>oggetto che viene inviato alla stampante.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: After OnStartPrint is called, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnStartPage%2A> method sets the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object to a graphic of a single page.
trans-unit.target: Dopo la chiamata OnStartPrint, il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnStartPage%2A>metodo imposta la <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>oggetto su un'immagine di una singola pagina.</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnStartPage%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnEndPage%2A> method clears the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object, while the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnEndPrint%2A> method deallocates the object.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnEndPage%2A>metodo cancella il <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>oggetto, mentre il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnEndPrint%2A>metodo la deallocazione.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnEndPrint%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.PrintControllerWithStatusDialog.OnEndPage%2A>

trans-unit.source: OnStartPrint is a good place to verify that <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings> are valid.
trans-unit.target: OnStartPrint è un ottimo strumento per verificare che <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings>sono validi.</xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"></xref> that represents the document currently being printed.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument"> </xref> che rappresenta il documento in fase di stampa.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs"> </xref> che contiene i dati dell'evento.
